welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ome, Japan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the beautiful natural scenery, rich history, and traditional charm of this city. Explore the local attractions, enjoy the delicious cuisine, and make unforgettable memories during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
